My Projects

Anna-Seva Portal: E-ration App
Sept 2025 - Present
A full-stack web application for digitizing India's Public Distribution System (PDS), enabling beneficiaries to locate Fair Price Shops, check stock availability, book ration tokens, and manage complaints. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, MongoDB, and Google Maps API, featuring JWT-based authentication, real-time inventory management, and role-based access for distributors and cardholders.
Tech Stack:
